verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> I <S%H6960>waited<s%> <S%H6960>patiently<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and he <S%H5186>inclined<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H7775>cry.<s%>

He brought me <S%H5927>up<s%> also out of a <S%H7588>horrible<s%> <S%H4480>pit,<s%> <S%H953><s%> out of the <S%H3121>miry<s%> <S%H4480>clay,<s%> <S%H2916><s%> and <S%H6965>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> a <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and <S%H3559>established<s%> my <S%H838>goings.<s%>

And he hath <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> even <S%H8416>praise<s%> unto our <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and shall <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is that <S%H1397>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7760>maketh<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H4009>trust,<s%> and <S%H6437>respecteth<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H7295>proud,<s%> nor such as turn <S%H7750>aside<s%> to <S%H3577>lies.<s%>

Many, <S%H7227><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> are thy wonderful <S%H6381>works<s%> which <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H6213>done,<s%> and thy <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> which are <S%H413>to<s%> usward: they <S%H369>cannot<s%> be reckoned up in <S%H6186>order<s%> unto <S%H413>thee:<s%> if I would <S%H5046>declare<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> of them, they are <S%H6105>more<s%> than can be <S%H4480>numbered.<s%> <S%H5608><s%>

Sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> and <S%H4503>offering<s%> thou didst <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2654>desire;<s%> mine <S%H241>ears<s%> hast thou <S%H3738>opened:<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and sin <S%H2401>offering<s%> hast thou <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7592>required.<s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H2009>Lo,<s%> I <S%H935>come:<s%> in the <S%H4039>volume<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> it is <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> me,
I <S%H2654>delight<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> thy <S%H7522>will,<s%> O my <S%H430>God:<s%> yea, thy <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H4578>heart.<s%>

I have <S%H1319>preached<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation:<s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3607>refrained<s%> my <S%H8193>lips,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest.<s%>

I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3680>hid<s%> thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> I have <S%H559>declared<s%> thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> and thy <S%H8668>salvation:<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3582>concealed<s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and thy <S%H571>truth<s%> from the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

Withhold <S%H3607><s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> let thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and thy <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> me.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H5704>innumerable<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H4557><s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%> have compassed me <S%H661>about:<s%> <S%H5921><s%> mine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have taken <S%H5381>hold<s%> upon me, so that I am <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> to look <S%H7200>up;<s%> they are <S%H6105>more<s%> than the <S%H4480>hairs<s%> <S%H8185><s%> of mine <S%H7218>head:<s%> therefore my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5800>faileth<s%> me.
Be <S%H7521>pleased,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me: O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> make <S%H2363>haste<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> me.

Let them be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that seek <S%H1245>after<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H5595>destroy<s%> it; let them be <S%H5472>driven<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%> and put to <S%H3637>shame<s%> that <S%H2655>wish<s%> me <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
Let them be <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> a <S%H6118>reward<s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> that <S%H559>say<s%> unto me, <S%H1889>Aha,<s%> <S%H1889>aha.<s%>

Let <S%H3605>all<s%> those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thee <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in thee: let such as <S%H157>love<s%> thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified.<s%>

But <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy;<s%> yet the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H2803>thinketh<s%> upon me: <S%H859>thou<s%> art my <S%H5833>help<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> make <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H309>tarrying,<s%> O my <S%H430>God.<s%>
